alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 9:47AM CST until February 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Black Creek Near Brooklyn affecting Forrest County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Creek Near Brooklyn. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Widespread flooding of lowland approximately 5 miles up and downstream of the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Black Creek Brooklyn 20.0 18.6 Fri 8 am CST 18.5 11.6 8.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM CST.
